title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2022
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government
Gazette dated Friday, 22nd July, 2022 835
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 51 OF 2022
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government
By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2022.
2. A candidate for election as Council Chairperson in the district Date and time
set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the Returning of nomination
for election
Officer on Thursday, 25th August, 2022, between 0900 hours and
1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 25th Campaign
August, 2022, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Wednesday, period
14th September, 2022.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a Council Chairperson in a Election date
district and ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on and time of
poll
Thursday, 15th September, 2022, between 0600 hours and 1800
hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
00 Statutory Instruments 4th March, 2022
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs 2 and 4)
ELECTIONS FOR COUNCIL CHAIRPERSON
Province District
Lusaka Luangwa
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 15th day of July, 2022.
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Member
V. M. MUKANDA,
Member
N. M. MUTITI,
LUSAKA Member
15th July, 2022
